subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: In New York’s racetrack kingdom, everyone knows Harry Rice III, who as a valet makes sure the right jockey, wearing the right silks, gets in the right saddle on the right horse.
snippet: In New York’s racetrack kingdom, everyone knows Harry Rice III, who as a valet makes sure the right jockey, wearing the right silks, gets in the right saddle on the right horse.
